info.title: GardenControlApi
info.description: An API that allows the monitor and control of devices plugged in to the GPIO Pins on a Raspberry Pi

post.description: Any value set for CanBeUpdated property will be ignored and always set to true

400.description: If the key or value is null or empty

404.description: If the AppSetting cannot be found

get.summary: Returns a reading value from the specified DS18B20 temperature probe

404.description: Could not find DS18B20 probe from id

get.summary:
Returns the serial numbers of all the attached probes to the specified GPIO Pin.
Useful for getting serial numbers to register each probe.

200.description: Returns a list of the 1-wire protocol serial numbers attached to the GPIO pin
